name: Big Agnes Echo Park -18C Synthetic Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
A roomy synthetic bag for winter camping. The wide profile feels more like a bed and less like a bag and it switches from a barrel bag, to a quilt, to a mummy bag (separately available accessory required). FireLine™ Max synthetic insulation keeps you warm without breaking the bank. As part of Big Agnes’ System line, it has an integrated sleeve to holds your pad snug against your bag.Shell is ripstop nylon with a water-repellent finish. Lining is soft polyester cotton blend.FireLine™ Max insulation is 50% recycled polyester. Multi-denier polyester insulation blends hollow and solid fibres to maximize comfort, loft and warmth.Double zippers let you enter from either side, or completely unzip the top for use as a comforter.Top can be zipped together with a separately available Park Bag Wedgie to create a mummy bag.Insulated draft tube along the hood.Integrated sleeping pad sleeve has side stretch panels to accommodate pads from 64–76 x 198cm.YKK #8 anti-snag zipper for a smooth, quick zip.Zips together with other Park series bags.Free Range Hood is cinchable with 1 hand and lets you lift and move your head.Built-in pillow pocket.Internal phone pocket.Interior loops for attaching a bag liner.Hang loops let you air it out in the sun.Includes a mesh storage bag and a nylon stuff sack.

        Sustainability
